scripts.android:dev: watchman watch-del-all && npx react-native run-android --variant=devDebug --appIdSuffix dev
scripts.android:alpha:apk: watchman watch-del-all && npm ci && cd android && ./gradlew assembleAlphaDebug && cd .. && open android/app/build/outputs/apk/alpha/debug
scripts.android:beta:aab: watchman watch-del-all && npm ci && cd android && ./gradlew bundleBetaRelease && cd .. && open android/app/build/outputs/bundle/betaRelease
scripts.android:prod:aab: watchman watch-del-all && npm ci && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProdRelease && cd .. && open android/app/build/outputs/bundle/prodRelease
scripts.ios:pod:install: bundle install && cd ios && bundle install && bundle exec --gemfile=../Gemfile pod install
scripts.ios:pod:uninstall: cd ios && bundle exec --gemfile=../Gemfile pod deintegrate
scripts.ios:dev: watchman watch-del-all && npx react-native run-ios --scheme Phonicstep-dev
scripts.update:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ios && bundle exec --gemfile=./Gemfile fastlane patch_update
scripts.update:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ios && bundle exec --gemfile=./Gemfile fastlane minor_update
scripts.patch-update: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ios && bundle exec fastlane bump
scripts.minor-update: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ios && bundle exec fastlane bump
scripts.major-update: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ios && bundle exec fastlane bump
